description: This file defines a React functional component called 'Header' that renders a top navigation bar with a hamburger menu. It manages the state of a side drawer menu, handles click and keyboard events to open/close the drawer, and includes navigation buttons for 'Home' and 'Schedule Manager'. The component uses React hooks such as useState, useRef, and useEffect, and leverages react-router's useNavigate for routing.

methods.name: Header
methods.description: React functional component that renders the header with navigation and drawer management.

methods.name: navigateTo
methods.description: Function to close the drawer and navigate to a specified path.
